actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore prior law with respect to the application of employer social security taxes to employees' cash tips.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to restore prior law for determining wages subject to employer social security taxes for certain employers whose employees receive income from tips.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore prior law with respect to the application of employer social security taxes to employees' cash tips.
